summary: This memo discusses George PERIS, a contact of Valentin HAHN, who is suspected of being a Soviet agent. It details HAHN's debriefing, his contacts, and the possibility of PERIS's involvement in espionage activities and connections to individuals of interest in previous investigations.
title: ZRGRACE - Tokyo Aspect; George PERIS aka George PERISTEROPOULOS aka George PARIS, Identified Contact of Valentin HAHN aka Valentine Vasiliyevich KHAN aka Won-shin HAN, Self Confessed Soviet Agent
